scripts.purge: docker stop testnet_postgres_1 && docker rm testnet_postgres_1 && docker volume rm testnet_db-data && docker volume rm testnet_sql
scripts.restart: docker stop testnet_postgres_1 && docker rm testnet_postgres_1 && docker volume rm testnet_db-data && docker volume rm testnet_sql && docker-compose -p testnet -f docker-compose-reef-testnet.yml up -d
